name: Free Buss Pass
description:
Our submission for Ludum Dare 44 made in about one evening on a Monday; way too busy over the weekend to do anything else. Apparently it's possible to make something in that time.

Coding/Art by Jacques (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEq__UwOi1m2SHuksQzCTlA)

Music by Joel (@JOYOBEATS)
